Support Me

If you wish to support or show appreciation to my work, you can do so using any of the following options.

Buy me a coffee on Ko-fi
Sponsor me on GitHub
Become my patron on Patreon
Support me on Flattr
Send me Bitcoin to 3AYQJ1BYo5yGtb6EiNLmDUPJUu2dVjXHKV

I also collect hardware to distribute to human rights defenders. You can donate some here. Your support is very much appreciated!
